overview: Carl Peterson has been immersed in the real estate industry for 18 years. After graduating from Gonzaga University, Carl began working with Windermere Real Estate Corporate as VP of Affiliate Services. During this time, Carl expanded the Windermere network across Eastern Washington and Idaho. He then grew a 30 agent real estate office to over 130 agents and two offices to become one of the largest real estate brokerage firms in Spokane, WA. Carl has been certified as a licensed real estate instructor in the State of Washington and licensed real estate Broker.
